• Our head is at (8,6), body at (8,5)/(8,4). We just came UP, so DOWN is illegal (that’s reversing into ourselves).

• LEFT aims at the apple at (7,2), but that’s symmetrically far (5 moves) and takes us away from the right‐side apple at (9,2), which we can reach faster.  
• If we go RIGHT to (9,6), then DOWN four times, we’ll land on (9,2) in 5 moves—quicker than the enemy (distance 8).  

Next‐turn strategy: After moving RIGHT, press DOWN repeatedly to grab the apple at (9,2), then sweep back west to collect the remaining apples.
